FuncDef: The display pim bsr-info command displays information about bootstrap routers (BSRs) in a PIM-SM domain. The display pim bsr-info command displays information about bootstrap routers (BSRs) in a PIM-SM domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about BSRs in all instances.
-

Displays information about the BSR in a specified VPN instance.
vpn-instance-name specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo: This command applies to the PIM-SM domain where a rendezvous point (RP) is dynamically elected using the BSR mechanism. You can run this command on any Router in the domain to view BSR information.
